hero.title: About SustainSage
hero.subtitle: We are an ICF-aligned, bilingual coaching practice shaped by UK and Taiwanese lived experience. We understand the pressure of real responsibilities and design coaching that respects consent, pace, and culture.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book an intro session with SustainSage
hero.imageAlt: Two coaches collaborating in a calm workspace

story.title: Why we founded SustainSage
story.body: We started SustainSage after seeing how many diaspora professionals were told to simply ‘push through’. Coaching should make room for the realities of immigration systems, caregiving, and workplace bias—not ignore them.

approach.title: How we coach
approach.body: Our conversations stay non-directive and transparent. We map the work together, pause when red flags appear, and only continue when there is genuine consent.

items.title: Client-led structure
items.description: You define priorities and pace. We provide frameworks and experiments only when they serve your goals.

items.title: Bilingual, cross-cultural lenses
items.description: Sessions can flow in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or a blend, making room for nuance.

items.title: Courage to say not a fit
items.description: If coaching is not right, we pause and signpost other services rather than forcing a misaligned engagement.

ethics.title: Ethics, confidentiality, and safeguarding
ethics.body: We hold ourselves accountable to the ICF Code of Ethics and UK safeguarding expectations.
items: Confidentiality is standard, with clear explanations of legal or safeguarding exceptions.
We outline scope, data handling, cancellation terms, and fees before any session begins.
When therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial support is needed, we pause coaching and refer or signpost options.

founders.title: Founders
founders.intro: Two coaches who bridge design, facilitation, and community work across the UK and Taiwan.

people.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
people.bio: Brings systems thinking and civic design to help clients test ideas responsibly.
people.focus: Works with mid-career restarters, public-sector leaders, and cross-cultural teams.

people.name: Yi-Ling Lai
people.bio: Creates reflective, trauma-informed spaces for diaspora professionals balancing care and ambition.
people.focus: Supports carers returning to work, community organisers, and early-career leaders.

cta.title: Curious about working together?
cta.body: Tell us what you are navigating. We will suggest formats—or recommend other services—so you can make an informed choice.
